messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Report

Thanks to the tireless efforts of our security and intelligence divisions, there are currently no credible threats to Space Station 13. All station construction projects have been authorized. Have a secure shift!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: It appears one of your crewmembers is floating in space thankfully a patrol ship found them and we are now Teleporting them to your station's hallways have a nice day

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All drugs are legal. Icky got a stiffy uh

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Space Station 13. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to a bluespace anomily expect wierd movement

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Auxiliary Base Construction.
